tool_description: Historical options data for most symbols on the NYSE and NASDAQ.
name: Lots of Options
title: Lots of Options

api_list.name: datesForOption
api_list.description: Return a list of dates where data is available for a provided option symbol

api_list.name: options
api_list.description: Returns data for a specific option. Either specify the stock, expiration date, strike price, and whether it was a "call" or "put", or specify the contract symbol.

api_list.name: expirations
api_list.description: Returns available expirations for a symbol. Available here means there is data available.

api_list.name: symbols
api_list.description: Returns available symbols. Available here means there is data available.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://lots-of-options.p.rapidapi.com/symbols/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lots-of-options.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://lots-of-options.p.rapidapi.com/symbols/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lots-of-options.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: optionsOnDate
api_list.description: Returns a list of option symbols that have data available on a specified date

api_list.name: listOptions
api_list.description: Returns a list of option symbols for a given symbol and expiration.
